page.title: 02GLASGOW AIRPORT,ABBOTSINCH
page.content: Glasgow Airport is the busiest airport operated by the British Airports Authority's Scottish Division.Replac- ing Renfrew Aerodrome,it was built in Abbotsinch,north of Paisley,and opened on 27th June 1966 by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth. The ownership of the airport re- mained with Glasgow Corporation until 1st May 1975 when it became part of the B.A.A. The number of passengers using the airport has regularly topped two and a quarter million.The airport has an increasing range of services to more than forty destinations throughout Europe and the U.K.including the "Shuttle" service to Heathrow,inaug- urated in 1975.It is the H.Q. of LOGANAIR.
